Ok, I just have to make this clear: If you download these codecs you will be able to watch pretty much anything from the net:

First download DivX from divx.com (duh?)
then download Xvid from xvid.org (duh again?)
then some videos needs some kind of ac3 filter or something, the player (in my case windows media player) usually tells you what sort of codec is missing.

I downloaded this episode with the Transmission Bittorrent client.
It played well, but with some skipping on Ubuntu 7.10 Hardy with the xine codec set.  It had no skipping on Windows.
I found the premise and storyline required not only suspension of disbelief and the expectation of a coherent storyline.  Still, I liked it.
